Flub.Name: Input Noise
Flub.Description: Introduces noise to the incoming grayscale map.

Flub.Name: Input Clarity
Flub.Description: Applies localized contrast enhancements to the incoming map.

Flub.Name: Input Auto Level
Flub.Description: Applies an autolevels filter to the incoming map.

Flub.Name: Reverse
Flub.Description: Reverses the mapping of the gradient.

Flub.Name: Sample Density
Flub.Description: The number of samples to use for interpolation between colors. Higher values give smoother gradients (within reason).

Flub.Name: Color Noise
Flub.Description: Introduces minor color distortions to the map.

Flub.Name: Output Clarity
Flub.Description: Applies localized contrast enhancements to the output texture.

Flub.Name: Output Auto Level
Flub.Description: Applies an autolevels filter to the output texture.
